title: Endings Guide
content:
ahead. Command the brain to destroy the tadpoles and then itself. Let's dominate the brain and rule the world, together. [MELEE ATTACK] Betray The Emperor. Dominate the Brain. Conquer the world.

This ending can be obtained by making the decision of commanding the Netherbrain to destroy itself while you're atop it as The Emperor resists its temptations to join The Absolute. This will successfully destroy the Netherbrain and the tadpoles under its command, and the fighting below in the city will
